name: Binkey 3: Abducted By The Spacemen
description:
The three in the award winning Binkey series!

NOT TO BE CONFUSED WITH "BINKY III: Binky's Traffic Jam"

Binkey 3: Abducted By The Spacemen

Binkey has been abducted by the spacemen from another planet. Can they escape before it is too late?

Control

Mouse - Move Binky

Left Click - Move to Next Screen, Play Sound Effect

Credit

Donkey Kong 3: Dai Gyakushū artwork ripped by shadowman44

Music

Battle Gorilla by Chihiro Fujioka
